title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: And when they are warnings, and how do we know that they are auspicious dreams, and here are the interpretations of this vision through the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin in a dream about a single girl. As Ibn Sirin says when he saw a black snake in an unmarried girl’s dream, the vision showed some warnings. It was also said that Seeing a black snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign that the dreamer is arrogant in making his decisions. It was mentioned in many of Ibn Sirin’s books that seeing a white snake in an unmarried girl’s dream is a testament to the purity and goodness of this girl’s character. A green snake dreamed of by an unmarried girl in a dream symbolizes marriage to a person with a good character. A dramatic snake attack in a dream for a single girl means that there is a great danger in the life of the dreamer. Seeing a large snake in a dream symbolizes a single girl that indicates an unjust vision. It is expected, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Ibn Sirin said about seeing a snake biting a girl in a dream. It indicates the desires of Satan and his false path, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: The white snake in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Interpretation of seeing a dream about a snake according to Ibn Sirin in a dream about a woman. Married When a married woman sees a group of snakes in a dream. Ibn Sirin can interpret this vision as major problems that will appear in the life of the dreamer. Ibn Sirin mentioned in some of his books that he sees a snake in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of happiness if the noisy vision suffers from Problems in her life. Either seeing a snake in a married woman’s dream means that there is an enemy in the life of that married woman, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a green snake in a married woman’s dream could be a sign that she has overcome some crises that she is going through. And the entry of many snakes To a married woman’s dream house, symbolizes worries and problems, or bad people. Maybe it means seeing a black snake in a married woman’s dream. It indicates the presence of a jealous or hidden enemy in the life of the dreamer. And when a married woman sees that snakes have overwhelmed him and hurt him in a dream The vision indicates that the deceitful dreamer has been exposed by those around him. Interpretation of the dream of a snake by Ibn Sirin in a dream about the man and its meaning. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a snake in a dream, a married man, as a sign of the presence of a great enemy in the life of the dreamer. Whereas if a snake bites a married man in a dream, The vision indicates the tearing of kinship ties, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for a snake chasing a married man in a dream, this means that enemies in the dreamer’s life are waiting for them. The appearance of many snakes from the stomach of a married man in a dream indicates harm from some relatives, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It is possible. Interpretation of seeing snakes coming out of the stomach of a married man. In deceiving one of the close ones, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a snake in the bed of a married man indicates a malicious woman in the dreamer’s life, not necessarily the woman. And if a married man sees snakes crawling into his house in a dream. The vision indicates an exploitative person present in the life of the person who has the vision. Read also: Escaping from the snake

title: Interpretation of the dream in which the deceased calls me in a dream

preview.html: In the following lines, we will provide an interpreter for his interpretation for the single, married, divorced, man, pregnant woman, and young man. Interpretation of a dream in which the deceased calls me in a dream about a single girl If an unmarried girl sees a dream that a dead person calls me in a dream. This reflects a change in her life for the better, and the happiness and kindness she receives. While the dead man sees her calling her loudly in a state of anger. It is a warning to her of a predicament that she will fall into as a result of her bad behavior and her need for a bond. Perhaps she saw the dead calling her in her dream. A warning to her from the plots of conspirators who seek to harm her, so she should be careful. Seeing an unmarried woman is a dream of a dead person calling me in a dream, good news for her that she is going through a sad stage in her life and the happiness that will follow. Seeing an unmarried dead girl calling in a dream by his name may be an expression of his need for supplication and charity on him while he is in the abode of truth. Also, the call of the dead to an unmarried woman in her dream is evidence of comfort after hardship and comfort after hardship. Seeing The deceased calling her and offering her food is evidence of her marriage and the stability of the family that she will enjoy. Seeing the deceased in a dream wearing clean clothes and inviting her in a dream, and the meaning of that is her piety and good qualities. See also: Ibn Sirin's detailed interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream Seeing a dream in which the deceased calls me in a dream about a married woman If a married woman dreams that the deceased was calling her in a dream. This expresses his urgent need for a good deed that will intercede for him in the abode of truth. Seeing the deceased calling a married woman in her sleep. It expresses the good things that happen in her life and brings her many good things. Interpretation of the dream in which the dead man calls me indicates happiness and family stability for the married woman. Also, the dream of the deceased calling me in a dream for a married woman is a sign of the need to wait in all matters of her life so as not to regret it. If a married woman hears the voice of a dead person and does not see her, this indicates the approach of pregnancy. Interpretation of the dream in which the deceased calls me in a dream about a divorced woman When a divorced woman sees a dead person in a dream, she calls her in a dream. This indicates a positive change in Her life, which God considers to be a successor to what came before her. Seeing the deceased calling her with a beautiful voice is a sign of her marriage to a man of good morals and a religion that fears God within her. Seeing a divorced woman dead in a dream calling her indicates that she is recovering from a spell that harms her and destroys her life. When the divorced woman sees in a dream that the dead man calls me in a dream. It is a good omen that she has gone through a difficult stage in her life. When she sees her deceased father talking to her, this expresses how close she is to God and her piety. When she sees that her son has died and she calls her even though he is actually alive. This indicates a person who has a lot of hostility and wants to harm her, but you will be able to overcome him. If she sees in her dream that she hears the voice of a dead person and does not see him. This is a message to her that her life will be filled with peace of mind and peace. Read also: Interpretation of Bak

title: Interpretation of seeing a shoe lost in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of losing a shoe by Ibn Sirin: Losing a shoe in a dream has more than one interpretation, as Ibn Sirin interpreted it as the loss of something or a person dear to the dreamer, or the loss of an opportunity or a cherished desire that he desired. For the wife. Whoever sees in a dream that he lost his shoes in an unknown place, this may mean that the dreamer is going through a period of anxiety and lack of money. He is searching for his lost shoes, and this is evidence of his loss in business or a separation between him and his wife. And whoever sees in his dream that he lost his shoes Somewhere and he did not find them, it means that he is working to achieve a specific thing that he wants and wants, but will not succeed. Interpretation of losing a man’s shoes in a dream If a man sees in his dream that someone has given him shoes, this means that he will divorce his wife, and seeing tight shoes is a sign of poverty and distress. Life, new shoes in a man's dream means that he hears good news. News, and high-heeled shoes for a man indicate his high status in front of people. Interpretation of losing women’s shoes in a dream: New shoes in a woman’s dream show the new man and her relationship with him, and high heels indicate marriage to a high-ranking person, while stealing a woman’s shoes indicates problems with her life partner. It may lead to divorce. Interpretation of losing shoes for single women: Seeing an unmarried girl losing her shoes in a dream indicates the loss of a cherished desire and goal that she was trying to achieve, and it could indicate the illness of someone close to her among her friends and relatives. Interpretation of losing shoes for a married woman: When a married woman sees her shoes being lost in a dream, this indicates a disorder. And trouble between her and her husband, but if her shoe falls into the water, this may indicate the husband’s illness and recovery. Interpretation of losing a shoe for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman losing her shoe in a dream indicates the family and marital difficulties and problems that she will go through. Interpretation of losing a shoe by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen said about the lost shoe in In a dream, it is a journey that will not be completed, and whoever sees his shoes falling into a well in a dream, this indicates the severance of the relationship between him and a woman from his family. . .

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the dead fighting with the living in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the dead fighting with the living. Many people always ask about the interpretation of a dream about the dead fighting with the living because they often see someone talking to one of their deceased relatives in a dream. This carries a signal or message for that person who sees it. Interpretation scholars have interpreted seeing the dead in a dream as reality, and this It means that what the dead person tells you is considered true because he is in the house of truth, but we are in the house of falsehood. Interpretation of the dream of the dead fighting with the living by senior interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of the dead fighting with the living. Many interpreters have interpreted the dream of a dispute with the dead in a dream, which is a vision that is often repeated in The dream is for many people. If someone sees in a dream that he is arguing with a dead person, this indicates problems that will arise in this dreamer’s family and he will participate in these problems. Interpretation of a dream about the dead fighting with the living In the dream, it indicates that great misfortunes will occur in the dreamer’s family. He believes Scientists believe that disputes and quarrels in a dream with a specific person are due to a specific situation that happened to that person, and he wants to empty the negative energy inside him, but he cannot do what he wants in reality. Interpretation of a dream about the dead fighting with the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of the living quarreling with the dead in The dream is an indication that something bad will happen to the dreamer. This person also needs to control his actions and this vision is a warning about the actions he takes. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of the birth of an only child and its interpretation of good and evil. Interpretation of seeing a dead person running in a dream after we have done it. Interpretation of the dream of the dead fighting With the living, therefore, we must also interpret the dream of escaping from death. Seeing escaping from a dead person in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is in a bad psychological state. When a person sees in a dream that he is escaping from a dead person and that this dead person was one of his relatives, this is evidence that he will face some Problems, but these problems will quickly disappear. Whoever sees in a dream that he is running away from his dead father, this is evidence of his father’s anger at him, because this dreamer is not being fair to his parents. When a person dreams that he is running away from his deceased uncles, this is a sign of many family problems. When A person sees in a dream that he is running away from his deceased wife, then this is evidence of that wife’s injustice in her life due to mistreatment of that wife, and he must repent for what he did to his deceased wife. If someone sees in a dream that he is running away from a deceased employer, this is evidence that this person is suffering from failure at work. Interpretation of seeing the dead being fired in a dream When a person sees in a dream that he is leading a dead person, this is evidence of the end of all the material problems of this dreamer. If a person sees in a dream that he is driving away his deceased father and he is happy, this is evidence of that person’s approval and righteousness of his parents. When a person sees that he is driving away one of his dead friends, this is evidence of the many problems that the dreamer faces in his future. When a person sees in a dream that he is driving The deceased is far away crying, this is evidence that this person hears

title: Interpretation of a dream about urinating: a dream about someone relieving himself

preview.html: Interpretation of defecation in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, whether she enters the bathroom, urinates in front of people, feces, urine in a dirty toilet with someone according to Ibn Sirin and others. Practicing in a dream is one of the most irritating dreams and causes anxiety to the dreamer. Seeing feces in a dream for a dreamer is one of the visions that indicate many meanings, and visions of feces for humans differ from visions of feces for birds and animals. Through our topic today, we will explain the interpretation of the vision. Feces in a dream according to the translator Ibn Shaheen in detail. Interpretation of longing in a dream Well, I saw this dream explaining about alleviating this young man’s distress as you know, so resting himself in the bathroom means alleviating his needs in this world, and this will be through your home, as well as trying to remove its effects. . Pimples on him, as well as evidence of his desire to help him. Interpretation of excrement in a dream. Seeing the dreamer’s ability to defecate is a praiseworthy vision, indicating goodness. As for seeing the dreamer’s inability to relieve himself, there is no good in it, and it is considered one of the visions that indicate sadness, worry, and anguish. Seeing light excrement in The dreamer's dream indicates praiseworthy visions that symbolize the answer to prayers and relief from distress, God willing. Also, seeing dark feces symbolizes differences between the dreamer and others, as well as bad luck. As for seeing yellow feces, it symbolizes illness and pain in the dreamer's life. Seeing feces Small children in a dream also symbolize a lot of goodness for the dreamer, and God Almighty is high. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream for a single woman: Seeing light feces symbolizes goodness on the way for the girl, as well as seeing small feces that brings kindness and joy, and it is good news of marriage, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing the inability to defecate symbolizes difficulties in the life of an unmarried girl. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream for a married woman: Seeing feces in a wife’s dream symbolizes kindness and the satisfaction of desires. Seeing a woman being able to defecate in a dream also symbolizes abundant blessings and strength in her married life. And family. Seeing the feces of young children in a dream is good news, comfort, pregnancy, and closeness, and God Almighty is high. Interpretation of feces in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing her light feces passing through symbolizes goodness and overcoming difficulties for the pregnant woman. Seeing the feces of young children in a pregnant woman’s dream also symbolizes good health. Herself and her child, God willing, and it also symbolizes the ease of labor and birth. As for seeing bird droppings in a dream, especially pigeons, it symbolizes a female if the bird is white. As for black bird droppings, it symbolizes the birth of a boy, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. In general, visions of feces and the ability to Defecating is an auspicious vision that symbolizes the ease of things for the dreamer and obtaining a lot of sustenance, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about urinating or taking a shower by Sheikh Waseem Yusuf - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about presenting a silver chain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a gift of a silver chain in a dream: We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about a gift of a silver chain in a dream. Of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some diligent scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of the dream of giving a silver chain in a dream Giving a silver chain in a dream can mean a lot of good that will come to the dreamer during these days, thanks to God: Dreaming about receiving a silver chain as a gift in a dream could indicate positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. In the event that you see a silver chain as a gift in a dream, it may indicate good emotional transformations that the dreamer will enjoy during those days, And God knows best. If a person sees that he received a silver chain as a gift in a dream, this may indicate happiness coming to him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about gifting a makeup box in a dream Giving a makeup box as a gift in a dream may indicate the great interdependence that exists between that person During those days. If the girl sees that her fiancé gave her a box of makeup in a dream, this may indicate his intense love for her, and praise be to God. If the girl sees that she received a box of makeup as a gift in a dream, this may indicate a lot of goodness for her in the coming days. And God knows best. Dreaming of receiving a box of makeup as a gift in a dream may indicate positive changes that will happen to the dreamer during these days, and God knows best. All Whoever dreams that a deceased person gives him a gift in a dream may indicate a loss or harm that the dreamer may suffer in his life, and God knows best. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman from Ibn Sirin, swimming skillfully in a dream for a single woman, and the interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman: Most girls want to learn to swim and practice this beautiful hobby that strengthens the body and affects the soul in a good and gentle way. There are happy connotations associated with a dream about swimming for a single woman, and that is if she can do so without exposing herself to drowning or obstacles. We will show you the meaning of the dream. Swimming for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman? Swimming in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates a group of indicators that depend on her ability and skills in this swimming. The stronger they are, the happier and more reassured the interpretation becomes. If she feels The girl is swimming in the sea water with great strength and ability. She is about to start an important relationship in her life, from an emotional relationship with someone or getting close to a loyal friend who reassures her and becomes... Support her in life. One of the signs of swimming in the sea is that she is thinking about creating a new project and another partner can come with her and she can work on it to a great extent and develop it in a short time because of the many skills that she possesses. If the girl finds that she is swimming in clear and beautiful water and she is happy to see There are blessed signs associated with this girl’s close relationship and a good marriage that includes security and kindness. But if she is floating in foul-smelling water, it is possible for her to get out of the emotional relationship she is in these days, because that leads her to sadness and severe suffering if she continues with it. And if If an unmarried woman sees that she is learning to swim and trying to float on the water, it expresses her continuous efforts to learn from her mistakes, manage life’s issues with precision and skill, and eliminate all the mistakes she makes. Her wisdom and great ability to concentrate could have fallen. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that a girl swimming in water, whether in the river or the sea, bodes well for her in her professional and emotional life, and this happens if she swims with strength and skill and is not afraid of water and waves. . . With the girl watching herself swimming lightly in the sea, it can be said that she is establishing a good relationship with someone who can be close to her and marry him because of the courage and generous spirit that she has. Interpretations of the dream of swimming for an unmarried woman depend on her not drowning in the water, because the meaning It indicates her ability to manage the events of her life and not make many mistakes that ruin her life while she is drowning in water. Water indicates that life’s circumstances will be difficult for her and her inefficiency in many matters. On the work front, the dream foretells for the girl many accomplishments that she will achieve because she works hard and diligently and is not lazy like some. When she is in the study period, pleasant surprises and high grades await her to fill her life. Pride and Joy. The Dream Interpretation section on an Egyptian site from Google contains many interpretations and questions from fans that you can view. Swimming skillfully in a single woman’s dreamCursing

title: Interpretation of loneliness in a dream

preview.html: Loneliness is one of the most difficult feelings that a person can experience. Interpretation of loneliness in a dream carries many symbols and connections between its aspects, so the dreamer feels dread and panic when he feels these feelings during sleep. Interpretation of loneliness in a dream for a single woman. The dream of loneliness in a dream for an unmarried girl is interpreted as kindness and livelihood, but This matter is due to the details of the dream. Feeling alone in one dream with crying and anguish is evidence of the end of distress and freedom from worry and sadness. The situation changes when you feel lonely and sad in the dream. Complaining to God about loneliness indicates the approaching date of the dreamer’s marriage to a man of good character and reputation. It is a sign of excellence if she is in the training stages. A girl turns away from her lover when she feels lonely and cries loudly in a dream. Interpretation of feeling lonely in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of feeling lonely in a dream for a married woman is as follows: A dream in which he feels lonely indicates the dreamer’s inability to Change his situation to what he likes. Loneliness in a married woman’s dream is a sign of fear and anxiety about some matters related to the future. Inability to take responsibility when feeling lonely in a married woman’s dream if she has children. There are differences between her and her life partner if she sees herself alone in Her home and she felt very sad in the dream. A dream of loneliness may indicate the dreamer’s separation from her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of feeling lonely in a dream for a pregnant womanSometimes a pregnant woman’s dreams are not taken into consideration, as interpreters consider her to be talking to herself only, but if the dream is true This indicates the following things: The intense feeling of fear of the stages of pregnancy that the viewer is going through. If the pregnant woman sees that she is alone and feels upset and sad, this indicates that she is going through a financial crisis. Loneliness is a sign of the dreamer’s fear of giving birth and even that she is afraid of being alone at the time. Childbirth. Loneliness in a pregnant woman’s dream of crying and screaming indicates the approaching date of birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of feeling lonely in a dream for a man. Seeing feeling lonely in a man’s dream indicates the difficulties he faces in the field of work and life. Some scholars interpreted that seeing loneliness in a man’s dream is a sign of His feeling of failure in reality. Loneliness expresses the intense sadness that the viewer feels as a result of not achieving the desires and goals he seeks. Loneliness in general in a man’s dream indicates instability and the inability to face the future if he is single. Loneliness in an individual’s dream indicates the presence of emptiness. Emotional and looking for a suitable life partner. Disagreements and instability in marital life if the priest is married. Interpretation of loneliness in a dream. Symbols conveyed by loneliness in a dream. Feeling lonely in a dream indicates many things, including: Feeling lonely in a man’s dream indicates leaving his job and being fired if he sees The dreamer himself is at work. If one sees himself alone in a dream and feels happy, this indicates that he is a special person and has good character.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a car accident by one of Ibn Sirin’s relatives

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a relative in a dream. When we see someone close to us getting into an accident, we feel very afraid and anxious for fear of being exposed to something bad in reality, and questions begin to circulate in the viewer’s mind about the dream’s interpretation, so we will learn together through this article all the indicators Expressed by the vision. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a relative. To see that someone close to you is involved in an accident in a dream and is saved from it, this is an expression of his being exposed to a health crisis, but he will soon survive it, but if he cannot escape from it, this symbolizes serious differences and problems between you. Seeing that a relative gets into an accident while he is driving the car is a symbol of recklessness and wrong decision-making by that person, which creates many problems and obstacles in life. Ibn Shaheen says that if a relative of yours is in an accident in a dream and extends his hand to you to help him, This vision indicates his urgent need for help, and you must take the initiative to provide assistance to him. If you see someone close to you riding a car and getting into an accident at sea, but you managed to survive, then this vision is one of the important visions that portends to you sustenance, abundance, and blessings in life. Interpretation of a dream about an accident. A car for a relative of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing someone close to you suffering from a serious accident that resulted in multiple injuries is that this vision is evidence of falling into serious risks and losing money. Seeing one of your relatives being in a car accident, which made you feel very sad and worried about him, is A sign that there are differences between you, but these differences will end soon. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a relative of a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream someone close to you causing an accident, this is a sign that her engagement is approaching, but from a person with a bad character, and it will cause you a lot Of problems and troubles. Ibn Sirin says that seeing an unmarried woman in an accident and the deterioration of your relative’s health condition is evidence of a very serious health crisis for that person. The expression of seeing a single woman getting into a traffic accident due to speed and reckless driving is one of the visions that carries a warning message of caution in Make decisions and avoid haste. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a married relative. Al-Ghanam says that seeing a married woman and her husband get into a car accident, this vision is an indication of the presence of serious disagreements between them and the financial crisis as a result of a lack of wisdom in managing family affairs. When the dream shows that a person close to the heart If a married woman sees that someone close to her was involved in an accident, but she was able to survive. Here Al-Nabulsi says about it, it is a good vision and it shows salvation and salvation from a major problem that was bothering her a lot. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for a pregnant relative Seeing someone close to the pregnant woman suffering from a serious traffic accident is an unwanted vision, and Ibn Kathir believes that it is...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing pears in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pear in a dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pear in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, and the interpretation of seeing buying a pear and eating a pear in a dream is a correct interpretation of the great scholars in translation. More mature, sometimes they enjoy the red color and delicious taste, and pear fruits must be grown in a very cold climate and abundant cultivation in the country of Turkey, the meanings and changes of seeing pears in a dream can vary, and many people want to know what is the interpretation of the dream about pears in a dream, and if we see good or bad, we will discover all this through the following lines. Interpretation of the dream of pears by Ibn Sirin Seeing pears in general in a dream is a sign of blessing in providing abundant money. Seeing pears in a dream indicates a lot of good, good and happy news that comes to knowledge, if it is in season. Interpretation of dreams to see pears out of season and this indicates anxiety, illness and severe distress. Ibn Sirin explained the dream of pears in a dream with many meanings, as he said that whoever saw it wishes for pears with their refreshing green color. This indicates that he will find a new job opportunity or that he will get a lot of money. As for whoever saw himself eating pears, this indicates a disaster with distress. Seeing the owner of the dream eating pears out of season, This indicates that the dreamer has obtained unlawful money, not his right. The interpretation of pears in a dream in green and red indicates goodness, grace and blessing. If you see a yellow pear in a dream, this means a sudden illness and severe fatigue. Seeing pears in a dream means that a stranger is trying to lure the dreamer out of greed. If you dream of a dreamer picking pears, this means that he will earn a lot of money. If you see a woman carrying pears in her dream, this means that she will be pregnant and give birth to a male. Interpretation of a dream about pears for a single woman An unmarried woman sees pears in her dream, and this is evidence that she will officially communicate with her lover and that there will be an engagement or marriage soon. Seeing pears in a dream for a girl indicates her overwhelming joy and there will be joy and happiness in her life during the coming period. Seeing pears for a single woman in a dream can mean that she will succeed in something she aspires to and desires and that she will achieve many achievements in her life. If you dream of a single woman peeling pears, this means that she will steal money from the inheritance. Interpretation Dream of a pear for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream pears in large quantities, this indicates that she will receive money. Whether it is a reward for her work or an inheritance that she will receive. Seeing a pear in a dream for a married woman If she is sick, she will recover from her illness and enjoy good health. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a pear in a married woman’s dream may indicate pregnancy soon. If one sees a married woman eating a pear in her dream, this means that she will get rid of her problems and her worries and sorrows will go away. Interpretation of a dream about a pear for a pregnant woman If she sees
